* * * ? * ?: Both day-of-month and day-of-week set (Quartz requires one be '?')
? ? ? ? ? ?: Can't have all fields set to '?'
0 0 * * *: Too few fields (5 instead of 6/7, looks like UNIX cron)
0 0 12 32 * ?: Day out of range (no month has 32 days)
0 0 12 * * * ?: Too many fields (7 with both DOM and DOW set)
0 0 12 15 5 3: Both day-of-month and day-of-week set (Quartz requires one be '?')
@every 5 minutes: Not Quartz syntax (Go-style or UNIX-style shortcut)
* * * * * * * *: Too many fields (8 instead of 6 or 7)
* * *: Too few fields (3 instead of 6 or 7)
0 0 24 * * ?: Invalid hour (24 is not valid in Quartz)
0 0 12 ? * 0: Invalid DOW: 0 is not valid in strict Quartz
0 0 12 1-31/32 * ?: Step beyond range (32-day step on a 31-day month)
0 0 12 ? ? MON: Two '?' characters (only one allowed—must specify either DOM or DOW)
0 0 12 ? * MON#: Invalid DOW modifier (# requires a number like MON#2 for 'second Monday')
0 0 12 ? * MON,LUN: Invalid weekday alias: 'LUN' (French for Monday?) not supported
0 0 12 * * * * *: Still too many fields—Quartz only allows 6 or 7
0 0 12 ? * * 99999: Year out of bounds—Quartz uses four-digit years
1,3,5,7-10 * * * *: Mixed list and range without clear syntax.
60 * * * *: Minute value 60 is out of range (0–59).
1-60 * * * *: Minute range end 60 is out of bounds (max 59).
* 1,3,5,7-10 * * *: Mixed list and range in hour field.
* 24 * * *: Hour value 24 is out of range (0–23).
* 1-24 * * *: Hour range end 24 is out of bounds (max 23).
* * 1,3,5,7-10 * *: Mixed list and range in day-of-month field.
* * 32 * *: Day-of-month value 32 is out of range (1–31).
* * 0-31 * *: Day-of-month range start 0 is below minimum (1).
* * * 1,3,5,7-10 *: Mixed list and range in month field.
* * * 12 * *: Too many fields (7-part cron using 6-part syntax).
* * * 0 *: Month value 0 is out of range (1–12).
* * * 13 *: Month value 13 is out of range (1–12).
* * * 0-11 *: Month range start 0 is below minimum (1).
* * * * 1,3,5,7-10: Mixed list and range in day-of-week field.
* * * * 7: Day-of-week value 7 is out of range (0–6).
* * * * 1-7: Day-of-week range end 7 is out of bounds (max 6).
* * * January *: Full month names are not supported.
* * * jan1 *: Invalid mixed value in month field.
* * * 1jan *: Invalid mixed value in month field.
* * * 2/feb *: Invalid use of named month in range.
* * * */feb *: Invalid increment format with named month.
* * * * Sunday: Full weekday names are not supported.
* * * * sun,mon-fri: Invalid mixed list and range format.
* * * * */mon: Invalid increment format with named day.
* * * * 1/wed: Mixed numeric and string value in increment.
